Grissom and his team go behind the scenes at a horror adult film studio when one of their lead actresses is murdered on the set of her latest movies
6 "Who & What" 08 Nov, 2007
In Part One of a Two-Part crossover episode to conclude on 'Without A Trace,' a kidnap victim from New York who went missing six years ago may be the same boy whose death Grissom and the CSI team are investigating in Las Vegas.
7 "Goodbye and Good Luck" 15 Nov, 2007
In Jorja Fox's last episode, a suspect from Sara's past returns, causing her to question her future as a CSI
8 "You Kill Me" 22 Nov, 2007
Hodges stages hypothetical murders in the lab in order to give his fellow lab techs a chance to play CSI, but unbenownst to them he has other motives behind his actions. Meanwhile, after Sara's farewell, everyone tries to comfort Grissom.
12 "Grissom's Divine Comedy" 03 Apr, 2008
Grissom is called while he has walking pneumonia, in order to solve a gang case after the grand jury's witness is murdered.
8 "Lover's Lanes" 19 Nov, 2009
The CSIs investigate a murder at a bowling alley after a critical piece of evidence is revealed during a bowling tournament.

Season 9

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "For Warrick" 09 Oct, 2008
The ninth season begins with the discovery of CSI Warrick Brown slumped over in his car after hearing the gunshots. The entire team grieves for their fallen friend while unknown to them the killer, the Undersheriff, investigates the murder. Sara Sidle returns when she hears the news.
2 "The Happy Place" 16 Oct, 2008
A hypnotist who uses her powers of persuasion to rob banks becomes the prime suspect in a murder investigation.
4 "Let It Bleed" 30 Oct, 2008
A man in a police costume robs a convenience store. Catherine's daughter Lindsey sneaks into a club with a fake ID, and a woman is found dead at the club.
5 "Leave Out All The Rest" 06 Nov, 2008
When the CSI team investigates a case involving the world of domination, Grissom pays a visit to Lady Heather to help find some answers.
10 "One To Go" 15 Jan, 2009
The CSI team is shocked and saddened when, after working with Dr. Raymond Langston on the 'Dick & Jane' murders, Grissom announces that his time as a CSI has come to an end and offers Langston a permanent position on the CSI team.

Season 10

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "Family Affair" 24 Sep, 2009
The CSI team, with the unexpected but welcome return of Sara, comes together to investigate the death of a famous young actress killed in a dubious traffic collision
2 "Ghost Town" 01 Oct, 2009
When a porn producer and drug dealer are found dead in a relatively upscale Vegas area, the CSIs focus their investigation on members of the neighborhood.
4 "Coup de Grace" 15 Oct, 2009
An off-duty cop accidentally shoots another cop, but the victim's racist tendencies suggest the incident was deliberate.
5 "Bloodsport" 29 Oct, 2009
After a beloved college football coach is found dead and his house drenched and spattered with his blood, the CSI team hunts for the killer who didn't find Coach Jimmy lovable at all.
6 "Death and the Maiden" 05 Nov, 2009
The CSIs discover that two apparently unrelated crimes are actually parts of the same twisted revenge plot.
10 "Better Off Dead" 17 Dec, 2009
The CSIs investigate the circumstances surrounding a twisted tale of attempted suicide.
12 "Long Ball" 21 Jan, 2010
The CSI team delves into the world of professional golf when the body of a legendary player is discovered during a high-profile tournament.
13 "Internal Combustion" 04 Feb, 2010
The case of two high school students, one dead and one missing, lead the CSIs into the underbelly of streetcar racing and a tangled web of deadly competition.
14 "Unshockable" 04 Mar, 2010
When a band member of Rascal Flatts is electrocuted by his own guitar during a concert, the CSI team investigates if it was a case of foul play.
15 "Neverland" 11 Mar, 2010
When a young boy is found murdered, the CSI team uncovers evidence that may link his death to an old case that recently resurfaced.
17 "Irradiator" 08 Apr, 2010
When the CSI team investigates the brutal murder of a family, they trace the killer to the house next door, which might belong to the 'Dr. Jekyll' serial killer.
19 "World's End" 22 Apr, 2010
When a student is discovered murdered at Lindsey's school, the investigation takes a sharp turn when the CSIs uncover an unlikely connection between the boy's death and atrocities of the past.
20 "Take My Life, Please!" 29 Apr, 2010
A legendary comic from the good old days of Las Vegas is set to reunite with his partner on stage for one night only, until one half of the famous duo is found dead.
22 "Doctor Who" 13 May, 2010
The CSI team must investigate one of their own when Langston is accused by a former colleague of being part of the Dr. Jekyll murders. Also Nate Haskell, the infamous 'Dick and Jane' killer, may have valuable information about the case.
23 "Meat Jekyll" 20 May, 2010
The CSI's lives are on the line as they close in on the elusive Dr. Jekyll, and more than one member of the team may not live to see his capture.

Season 11

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "Shock Waves" 23 Sep, 2010
Langston fights for his life after being stabbed by psychopath Nate Haskell, while the other CSIs attend a funeral that turns deadly.
2 "Pool Shark" 30 Sep, 2010
Hysteria ensues when a shark attacks a woman in the pool at a Las Vegas casino 'day club,' and the CSIs must determine if the killer is human or shark.
3 "Blood Moon" 07 Oct, 2010
A vampire and werewolf convention is at the heart of a murder investigation in Las Vegas.
4 "Sqweegel" 14 Oct, 2010
Sqweegel, a serial killer who is punishing local heroes that harbor hidden secrets, is on the hunt in Las Vegas.
5 "House of Hoarders" 21 Oct, 2010
A woman who suffers from a condition called 'hoarding' becomes a murder suspect when a dead body is found buried under piles of trash and debris inside her home.
6 "Cold Blooded" 28 Oct, 2010
When a college student ends up dead after a 'Walking with Dinosaurs' show, the CSIs must determine if his death was murder or accidental.
7 "Bump and Grind" 04 Nov, 2010
When the CSI team discovers the shredded remains of a man, they find themselves with multiple suspects who may be responsible for his death.
8 "Fracked" 11 Nov, 2010
A large explosion at a gas company gives the CSI team further evidence in their investigation into the murders of two men who were about to accuse the company of poisoning the water in a farming town.
9 "Wild Life" 18 Nov, 2010
A man's fatal fall from a hotel balcony launches the CSIs into an investigation to determine if his death was suicide or the result of foul play.
10 "418/427" 09 Dec, 2010
The CSIs set out to track down a pedophile suspected of murdering an FBI agent's wife and kidnapping his children.
11 "Man Up" 06 Jan, 2011
The CSIs question the validity of an online picture depicting a murdered call girl until they find the same woman strangled to death in the dumpster that appears in the photo.
12 "A Kiss Before Frying" 20 Jan, 2011
The CSIs link a body with severe burn marks to possible execution by electric chair – and to a legendary Vegas murder. Meanwhile, Greg asks out Ellen, a pretty schoolteacher and forensics enthusiast who has been touring the crime lab.
13 "The Two Mrs. Grissoms" 03 Feb, 2011
A night full of celebration ends with a bang when the director of a scholarship foundation for the deaf is killed by a deadly car bomb, prompting Sara to interrogate the students and faculty of the college where her mother-in-law works.
14 "All That Cremains" 10 Feb, 2011
A thrift store donation turns gruesome when a dead body is found in a box; meanwhile, Langston's wife pays a surprise visit to the crime lab.
15 "Targets of Obsession" 17 Feb, 2011
Langston testifies against the notorious 'Dick & Jane' killer, Nate Haskell. Meanwhile, Nick receives a call from troubled teen Jason McCann to warn him of impending danger.
16 "Turn On, Tune In, Drop Dead" 24 Feb, 2011
The CSIs are on zombie alert when two men initially pronounced dead mysteriously come back to life.
17 "The List" 17 Mar, 2011
The team investigates the prison murder of a cop, Vance, who was incarcerated for murdering his wife, but believed he was framed.
18 "Hitting For The Cycle" 31 Mar, 2011
The CSIs start a frenzy of betting pools when it looks like they're about to hit The Cycle: a homicide, suicide, accidental death and natural death all in one shift.
19 "Unleashed" 07 Apr, 2011
While investigating a woman's death, Sara and Langston turn to a friend of Grissom's for help; after a teenager appears to have committed suicide, Nick and Dr. Robbins save her unborn baby.
20 "Father of the Bride" 28 Apr, 2011
Nick and Greg have a barn full of scattered body parts to piece together -- without names or heads to identify them. Langston's old nemesis, Nate Haskell, is back in action and playing his usual game of five-level chess against the LVPD.
21 "Cello and Goodbye" 05 May, 2011
The CSI team investigates serial killer Nate Haskell in Los Angeles. Langston becomes more determined than ever to track down Nake Haskell, the notorious 'Dick & Jane' killer, after discovering that he's kidnapped his ex-wife, Gloria.
22 "In A Dark, Dark House" 12 May, 2011
After years of pursuit and a countless number of murders, Langston comes face-to-face with serial killer Nate Haskell inside the house where his killing spree began. Langston finally vanquishes his longtime nemesis Nate Haskell, but the question remains, will I.A. pronounce the kill a righteous one?

Season 12

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "73 Seconds" 21 Sep, 2011
A crazy, chaotic shoot-out on a hotel tram leaves two dead, almost no witnesses, and a lot of contradictory evidence; another dead man in Panaca County has a young man’s face and an old man’s body.
2 "Tell-Tale Hearts" 28 Sep, 2011
Three suspects come forward with three different reasons why they killed an entire family and the CSI team has to determine who is telling the truth.
3 "Bittersweet" 05 Oct, 2011
A sexual sadist walks free after getting a slap on the wrist by the system, and Sara makes it her personal crusade to put the woman back behind bars.
4 "Maid Man" 12 Oct, 2011
The CSIs attend the gala grand opening of a mob museum, only to witness an attempted hit on mob lawyer and former mayor Oscar Goodman.
5 "CSI Down" 19 Oct, 2011
The CSI unit investigates when Frank, an apparent murder victim, sits up and needs help. But in fact, he's not just a victim, he's also a double murderer, and he coolly hijacks the Medevac helicopter taking him to a hospital.
6 "Freaks and Geeks" 02 Nov, 2011
The murder of a popular sideshow performer sends the team behind the scenes at a carnival freak show.
7 "Brain Doe" 09 Nov, 2011
The CSI crew is stumped when they discover a disembodied brain at a crime scene where all the other brains are accounted for.
8 "Crime After Crime" 16 Nov, 2011
Three new murders related to three unsolved (or incorrectly solved) crimes from the past come back to haunt the CSIs.
9 "Zippered" 07 Dec, 2011
The murder of a retired Army Ranger brings the FBI in on the case, to Russell and Catherine's initial chagrin.
10 "Genetic Disorders" 14 Dec, 2011
When a man's dead body turns up naked in the bed of Judy Robbins (Doc Robbin's wife), the detectives try to 'just work the scene' without bringing their pre-judgments to the table -- but it sure looks like a case of Death During Adultery.
11 "Ms. Willows Regrets" 18 Jan, 2012
Catherine's friend Laura has a mogul husband, and Mark has a lot to hide behind his successful international corporation. He's hired a crack team of assassins to carry out the murders of anyone who might be aware of what he's doing--and that includes Laura's lawyer and even Laura herself.
12 "Willows In The Wind" 25 Jan, 2012
A grisly string of killings being investigated by both the LVPD and the FBI has the authorities on a wild goose chase - until Russell comes up with a theory that ultimately leads to the capture of the real bad guys.
13 "Tressed To Kill" 08 Feb, 2012
The CSI crew investigates a series of murders by a serial killer who seems to be re-creating a specific woman with the corpses of the women he kills.
14 "Seeing Red" 15 Feb, 2012
Russell asks for advice from a former colleague on a case involving the death of a man’s ex-girlfriend. Nick helps a car crash victim and amnesiac piece together a brutal crime scene.
15 "Stealing Home" 22 Feb, 2012
Seeing is believing but how did a whole house get stolen off its foundation?
16 "CSI Unplugged" 29 Feb, 2012
When a blackout cripples the city, the CSIs must revert to old-school methods to solve the case of a missing child.
17 "Trends With Benefits" 14 Mar, 2012
A wild college party takes a tragic turn when a popular video blogger with some juicy dirt to spill winds up very dead.
18 "Malice In Wonderland" 21 Mar, 2012
A pair of thieves plan to hit three high-profile Vegas weddings in three days.
19 "Split Decisions" 04 Apr, 2012
The CSI team shuts down an entire casino in an effort to find the person who shot a man at point-blank range ... and is still in the casino.
20 "Altered Stakes" 11 Apr, 2012
A criminal might get out of prison after the death of a dirty cop reveals the prisoner gave his confession under coercion.
21 "Dune and Gloom" 02 May, 2012
The mysterious death of a race truck driver has the CSI team on the hunt for what might be a sleeper cell but turns out to be a trio of dreaming misfits.
22 "Homecoming" 09 May, 2012
When a friend of the Sheriff becomes a prime suspect in his wife's brutal murder, the investigation's political fallout reveals the truth behind Russell's troubled history with Finlay. Also, an old foe of the CSIs resurfaces and threatens the team.

Season 13

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "Karma to Burn" 26 Sep, 2012
Season 13 picks up where last season left off for our CSIs Russell's granddaughter has been kidnapped, Finlay is in harm's way, Morgan's father has been shot, and all signs point to corruption within the local police force. Will the CSIs be able to piece together the evidence, take down the corrupt cops, and find Russell's granddaughter before it's too late?
2 "Code Blue Plate Special" 10 Oct, 2012
A massacre at a beloved local diner has the CSIs shaken.
3 "Wild Flowers" 17 Oct, 2012
When a runaway sex slave is murdered during a rave in the desert, the detectives have to find the man responsible.
4 "It Was A Very Good Year" 24 Oct, 2012
The CSI is on the hunt for the person who killed a pretty young woman, found dead in the desert. Unfortunately, for Greg, the case has personal ramifications.
5 "Play Dead" 31 Oct, 2012
A police officer is killed, and the only living witness is his dog; a predatory divorce attorney is murdered, and the world seems just a little sweeter.
6 "Pick and Roll" 07 Nov, 2012
The Coach of the West Las Vegas University basketball team is a difficult, imperious, petty tyrant with a complicated personal life -- and when he's found bludgeoned to death in his locker room, Detective Russell's son Charlie is the prime suspect.
7 "Fallen Angels" 14 Nov, 2012
When a dead CSI officer's prints are found at the scene of murder, the team begins to suspect that a 'guardian angel' has been acting to project his loved ones from beyond the grave.
8 "CSI on Fire" 21 Nov, 2012
When the decomposed bodies of eight young women appear in a newly made mass grave in the Nevada desert, Finley quickly realizes that one of the women--and presumably the other seven--is a victim of her long-time nemesis, Seattle serial killer Tom Cooley.
9 "Strip Maul" 28 Nov, 2012
When the CSIs agree to help out the Las Vegas Police Department's Mobile Crime Unit, they're quickly stuck with a rogues' gallery of bizarre street criminals -- and one dead body, with more to follow.
10 "Risky Business Class" 12 Dec, 2012
When a small executive jet crash lands a mile off the Strip, the CSIs wonder if it was intended as an act of terror, and to solve the case, Sara teams up with a former colleague from San Francisco with whom she still has sparks.
11 "Dead Air" 16 Jan, 2013
When the power goes out on set, a notoriously difficult anchorwoman is murdered at her desk during a live news broadcast, leaving the CSIs to solve a classic 'locked room' mystery.
12 "Double Fault" 23 Jan, 2013
The promising career of a rising tennis pro is cut short by a vengeful killer.
13 "In Vino Veritas" 06 Jan, 2013
When CSI Mac Taylor decides to surprise his girlfriend in Vegas, he discovers she’s missing and asks his friend D.B. Russell for help. Meanwhile, the CSIs investigate the loss of a local wine collector on part one of a two-part crossover with CSI:NY
14 "Exile" 13 Feb, 2013
Cuban singing sensation Silvana is about to make her U.S. debut at Estefan's Vegas nightclub, much to the ire of the Cuban exile community, led by Willie, who considers her a tool of the Cuban government. But when Silvana's sister Marta is tortured, poisoned and killed, it seems that Silvana has also become the target of a vengeful killer.
15 "Forget Me Not" 20 Feb, 2013
Things don't look good for Sara who's being indicted for murder. But Sara knows she's being framed and sets out to catch the perpetrator at his own game.
16 "Last Woman Standing" 27 Feb, 2013
A poker-obsessed serial killer is stalking the streets of Las Vegas, trying to avenge a long-forgotten group of Championship Cheaters.
17 "Dead of the Class" 20 Mar, 2013
At his wife's urging, David reluctantly attends his high school reunion -- which becomes a crime scene when the bitchy former high school queen is found dead in a back room.
18 "Sheltered" 03 Apr, 2013
When a young camper is stalked and slain in a remote area populated by Doomsday Preppers, the team investigates an underground bunker that holds several shocking surprises.
19 "Backfire" 10 Apr, 2013
When the CSIs investigate a triple homicide, Russell has to find a way to connect with a 6-year-old girl who was the sole survivor and witness.
20 "Fearless" 01 May, 2013
When a body is found in the 'sacred mud bath' at a Force of Mind seminar, the team must sift through some byzantine motives to catch a killer.
21 "Ghost of the Past" 08 May, 2013
A brutal murder at a haunted house (formerly owned by a vicious serial killer) leads the CSI team to probe the boundaries of the supernatural.
22 "Skin in the Game" 15 May, 2013
The CSI team needs to brush up on their Medieval Italian, because 'Dante's Inferno' is the text chosen for illustration by a particularly twisted homicidal maniac.

Season 14

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "The Devil and D.B. Russell" 25 Sep, 2013
With Morgan and Ellie's lives on the line, the CSIs race to stop a serial killer from completing his twisted homage to 'Dante's Inferno.'
2 "Take the Money and Run" 02 Oct, 2013
A complex casino heist has the CSIs scratching their heads.
3 "Torch Song" 09 Oct, 2013
When the smoke from a nightclub fire clears away and four dead bodies are revealed, the CSI team goes looking for an amateur arsonist.
4 "Last Supper" 16 Oct, 2013
The name of the hit cooking show, 'Slice and Dice,' takes on a grim new meaning when a sliced-and-diced former contestant is incorporated into a 'special challenge.'
5 "Frame by Frame" 23 Oct, 2013
When a young woman is found dead in reclusive mogul mansion, the team thinks it's a repeat of a decade-old murder, also involving the mogul: Mr. Witten. But the twists and turns of the case take them in surprising directions they had never anticipated.
6 "Passed Pawn" 30 Oct, 2013
The CSI team investigates the death of a homeless man who had a huge winning streak at a small casino.
7 "Under a Cloud" 06 Nov, 2013
A man pulled from a flood channel with a bomb in his backpack wakes up speaking a foreign language, and Greg struggles to recall a case from 2006 that may threaten his future as a CSI.
8 "Helpless" 13 Nov, 2013
The discovery of a bludgeoned, bloody corpse inside a 'human hamster ball' (a six-foot tall, clear plastic ball) has the CSIs scratching their heads.
9 "Check In and Check Out" 20 Nov, 2013
A series of grisly but apparently unrelated murders, which all take place in the same seedy motel room, have the team wondering if the room really is a demonic an deadly site that 'possesses' its inhabitants.
10 "Girls Gone Wild" 27 Nov, 2013
A spa weekend for Sara, Finlay and Morgan turns into a murder investigation and missing persons case when Finlay disappears, as the CSI team must piece together what happened in detail to find her.
11 "Lost Reindeer" 11 Dec, 2013
When a man is found murdered at an elaborate holiday party complete with real snow and live reindeer, the CSI team is brought in to investigate.
12 "Keep Calm and Carry-on" 15 Jan, 2014
An inbound plane's passengers become the victims of an onboard thief, but when one of the passengers is found dead, the petty crime turns into a murder investigation.
13 "Boston Brakes" 22 Jan, 2014
The CSIs are called to investigate a car crash and are shocked to discover the victim is someone they know.
14 "De Los Muertos" 05 Feb, 2014
When the CSI team works two separate investigations, one involving a woman found murdered in Mexico and another of a local couple found dead in their driveway, they find the evidence in one case may help the other.
15 "Love For Sale" 19 Feb, 2014
Nick and Greg investigate the death of a 16-year-old girl with ties to a brothel.
16 "Killer Moves" 05 Mar, 2014
The CSIs investigate the murders of an Elvis impersonator and a bird that are strangely connected.
17 "Long Road Home" 12 Mar, 2014
The CSIs investigate the murder of a rock and roll groupie and the disappearance of a prostitute that both have ties to a mysterious band.
18 "Uninvited" 19 Mar, 2014
The CSIs are called to investigate when an entire family is reported to have been missing for a month.
19 "The Fallen" 02 Apr, 2014
Russell is taken hostage after a teenager opens fire in a police station.
20 "Consumed" 09 Apr, 2014
A killer with a taste for human flesh appears to be preying on people who fantasize about being devoured. A group of vorarephiliacs -- someone who is fixated on eating, or being eaten by, other living beings. Meanwhile, an experienced retired sheriff has coffee with Ecklie and gives him some career advice.
21 "Kitty" 30 Apr, 2014
''Spin-Off Episode'': The murder of a casino mogul's wife grabs the attention of Avery Ryan, the brilliant Special Agent in Charge of the FBI's Cyber Crime Division in D.C.
22 "Dead In His Tracks" 07 May, 2014
The CSIs investigate a present-day crime with ties to a mob heist that occurred 25 years ago. Meanwhile, Brass has a decision to make when his daughter attempts suicide.

Season 15

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "The CSI Effect" 28 Sep, 2014
A notorious serial slayer, brought to justice by Russell years ago, faces imminent execution -- until a cunning copycat casts his guilt into serious doubt -- and casts a shadow over Russell's previous investigation.
2 "Buzz Kill" 05 Oct, 2014
When a marijuana dispensary owner's wife and children are abducted, the team launches an investigation to track the victims -- not knowing whether they are still alive or not.
3 "Bad Blood" 12 Oct, 2014
Sara and Greg are quarantined after responding to a crime scene that’s contaminated with a deadly pathogen.
4 "The Book Of Shadows" 19 Oct, 2014
The CSI team suspects foul play when a chemistry teacher’s science experiment goes horribly wrong.
5 "Girls Gone Wilder" 09 Nov, 2014
'Morgan, Sidle and Finlay try to relax at a forensics conference when a mass shooting occurs on site.
6 "The Twin Paradox" 16 Nov, 2014
Frustration mounts for the CSI team as another victim surfaces and all evidence points to the Gig Harbor Killer.
7 "Road To Recovery" 23 Nov, 2014
The CSI team investigates the death of a woman full of alcohol and drugs in a pool at a rehab facility.
8 "Rubbery Homicide" 30 Nov, 2014
The CSI team delves into the kinky world of “rubber dolls” when they investigate the murder of a man stabbed in an alley.
9 "Let's Make A Deal" 07 Dec, 2014
The CSIs investigate a murder at the Clark County jail after an inmate stumbles upon a body while running away from officers.
10 "Dead Rails" 14 Dec, 2014
The CSI team investigates the bizarre death of a man who was killed not once, but twice.
11 "Angle of Attack" 21 Dec, 2014
The CSI’s investigation of the victim of an apparent hit and run leads them into the world of aeronautics.
12 "Dead Woods" 28 Dec, 2014
The CSI team reopens a 10-year-old murder/suicide case when the sole survivor claims her accused father was innocent.
13 "The Greater Good" 04 Jan, 2015
The CSI team learns the main suspect in the gig harbor killings is being released from jail due to lack of evidence.
14 "Merchants of Menace" 25 Jan, 2015
The CSI team investigates a homicide at a convention for people who collect macabre murder memorabilia.
15 "Hero to Zero" 25 Jan, 2015
The CSI team investigates the murder of a young victim dressed as a superhero.
16 "The Last Ride" 27 Jan, 2015
The CSI team investigates a death involving a vintage car and a chrome-covered victim.
17 "Under My Skin" 15 Feb, 2015
The CSI team investigates a murder with ties to two teenaged kidnapped girls.
18 "The End Game" 15 Feb, 2015
The CSI unit faces the final showdown with the Gig Harbor killer whose motives are finally revealed. Also, Nick Stokes makes a decision that will affect the entire team moving forward.

Season 16

# Title Airdate Rating
1 "Immortality (Part 1)" 27 Sep, 2015
Grissom and Willows return to help the CSI team solve a catastrophic case that paralyzes all of Las Vegas.
2 "Immortality (Part 2)" 27 Sep, 2015
Is Lady Heather the victim in the mysterious bombings or is she the perpetrator?
